name: WP Notifications Manager
author: Chad Anderson

sections.description: Allows you to manage new user registration & password change notifications. You can enable/disable the notifications and also specify the email address to which you want the notifications sent.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-notifications-manager to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu item in the WordPress Dashboard.
  3. Once the plugin is activated, access its settings page under Settings->WP Notifications Manager
sections.faq:
What is the default behavior if no email addresses are supplied?

If you do not supply an email address to which to send notifications, the default admin email address will be used.

short_description: Manage new user registration & password change notifications.
description: Allows you to manage new user registration & password change notifications. You can enable/disable the notifications and also specify the email address to which you want the notifications sent.
